<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gossip Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=6304) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 195 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Dandy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=246), [Venture-Gossip](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=311) (Level 4), [Prophet of Kalistrade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=315) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Dandy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6302)

</column>

---

Your time gossiping in fashionable salons keeps you informed on every topic. You are trained in Gossip Lore, a special Lore skill that can be used only to [Recall Knowledge](/Skills.aspx?General=true&ID=24), but on any topic. If you fail a check to Recall Knowledge with Gossip Lore, you get the effects of the [Dubious Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=5142) skill feat. If you have legendary proficiency in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47), you gain expert proficiency in Gossip Lore, but you can’t increase your proficiency rank in Gossip Lore by any other means.
name: Gossip Lore
